tweet: Rural forest counties in Idaho rely on #SRS payments to provide vital services. I’m proud to work with @MikeCrapo and @RonWyden to provide these communities with a permanent fix that will allow them to thrive long into the future. pic.twitter.com/Mqxq4ALlB0

Vicki and I were saddened to learn the news about Senator Cochran’s passing this morning. Not only was he a great statesman and senator, he was also a man of remarkable integrity. Our prayers are with Senator Cochran’s family, friends, and the state of Mississippi.
On Memorial Day, Vicki and I honor the brave men and women who made the ultimate sacrifice to defend our nation.
Idahoans are fed up by the constant stream of illegal and unwanted #robocalls. That’s why I voted in favor of the #TRACEDAct to stop illegal robocalls and help protect Idahoans from robocall fraud.

Yesterday @RonWyden & I introduced a bipartisan bill to allow biomass collected from federal lands to be considered renewable. In Idaho where nearly two-thirds of our land is owned by the federal government, it’s the responsible thing to do.
A big congratulations to Rocky Mountain HS’s rugby team on its national championship win. Great job bringing home the gold to Idaho.

Great news! On Friday @POTUS signed the Target Practice & Marksmanship Training Support Act to build & maintain shooting ranges. I’ve cosponsored this bill since 2009 & am glad the next generation of sportsmen will continue to take part in one of Idaho’s most treasured pastimes.
